siddhi ati sparśavat tvam aṇu tva vyāpyam iti sva yūthya siddhāntam aṅgīkṛtya

original: anaṅgīkṛtyāpi kāṇāda - gautamasammatam avayavivādaṃ saṃhateṣu paramaṇuṣveva
analyzed: an aṅgīkṛtya api kāṇāda gautama sammatam avayavi vādam saṃhateṣu parama ṇuṣu eva
sthaulya ādeḥ pratītiḥ svīkṛtā
ukta trividha anitya paramāṇu vādiṣu atīta anāgata akāla sattāyāḥ apākaraṇāt
sautrāntike eva pradhāna padam bibharti

original: yena tatpratipādita - kṣaṇabhaṅgavāda - kṣaṇasantativādābhyāṃ vastunaḥ sūkṣmatamaṃ
analyzed: yena tat pratipādita kṣaṇa bhaṅga vāda kṣaṇa santati vādābhyām vastunaḥ sūkṣmatamam

original: svalakṣaṇarūpaṃ prajñaptisacca sāntānikaṃ rūpaṃ prakāśatāṃ gacchati | savavyāpi
analyzed: sva lakṣaṇa rūpam prajñapti sat ca sāntānikam rūpam prakāśa tām gacchati sava vyāpi
ca ayam sautrāntika sammataḥ dravya paramāṇuḥ anityaḥ
deśataḥ kālataḥ svarūpataḥ ca vicchinnaḥ
svatantraḥ ca iti sampannaḥ kṣaṇa paramāṇuḥ eṣaḥ
santāna rāśi ādi rūpeṇa jñāyate

original: yatra daiśikaṃ kālikaṃ karmafalādikaṃ sambandhataḥ prakarṣataśca
analyzed: yatra daiśikam kālikam karma fala ādikam sambandhataḥ prakarṣataḥ ca
paripuṣṭam sat bhāsate
etādṛśa paramāṇu vāda svīkārāt eva vastuvādinaḥ
bauddha stīrthika bāhya artha vādibhyaḥ vyāvṛttāḥ bhavanti
ayam ca vyāvṛtti prakāraḥ

original: prameye pramāṇaviṣaye ca samānameva paryavasito bhavati |
analyzed: prameye pramāṇa viṣaye ca samānam eva paryavasitaḥ bhavati
vaiśeṣika naye paramāṇuḥ nityaḥ
sthiraḥ dvi aṇuka ādi krameṇa ārabdhasya avayavinaḥ
samavāyi kāraṇam
guṇa karma viśeṣa ādīnām āśrayaḥ
bauddha abhimataḥ tu paramāṇuḥ
atīndriyaḥ api pratyutpanna kāla mātra sattvāt kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ
tasmāt anityaḥ
guṇa karma ādīnām anāśrayaḥ anavayavi rūpaḥ siddhi ati
evam ca bauddha sammata paramāṇu svīkāreṇa gautama kaṇāda aṅgīkṛtam
rūpa ādi atiriktam rūpa ādi adhiṣṭhānam eka pratyaya hetu avayavi dravyam
apara apara deśa utpanna hasta ādi kṣaṇāt bhinnam karma
vyakti vyatireki sāmānyam ca iti vādāḥ nirākṛtā

original: bhavanti | ata eva nyāyavaiśeṣikābhimatāḥ sarvā api dravya - guṇa - karmādipratītayo bauddhamatenānādivāsanālakṣaṇāntarakāraṇanibandhāḥ
analyzed: bhavanti atas eva nyāya vaiśeṣika abhimatāḥ sarvāḥ api dravya guṇa karma ādi pratītayaḥ bauddha matena anādi vāsanā lakṣaṇa antara kāraṇa nibandhāḥ
prajñapti mātrāṇi
na tāḥ artha dhīnāḥ evam
yadi api ayam nitya paramāṇu vādaḥ vaiśeṣika paramparā anuprāptaḥ tathā api tebhyaḥ
kṣaṇa bhaṃga āpattyā pūrva bauddhaiḥ jīrṇīkṛtaḥ
para varttibhiḥ ca vijñāna pade saṃsthāpya asau jaḍa aṇuḥ cetanā bhāsīkṛtaḥ
cetanā bhāsībhūtasya asya paramāṇoḥ

original: svarūpaṃ svasaṃviditaṃ saṃ bāhyapadārthānanabhyupagacchāṃ navyabauddhānāṃ kṛte
analyzed: sva rūpam sva saṃviditam sam bāhya padārthān an abhyupagacchām navya bauddhānām kṛte
jñānasya anāsravam jaḍa nirmuktam ca advaita svarūpam prakaṭayati
ittham bauddhānām
ābhāsa vapuḥ paramāṇu cintayā an ābhāsaiḥ bāhya jaḍaiḥ jaḍīkṛtam iva
pramāṇa dvāram apākṛtya pramā tva vyākaraṇāya bāhya śūnyam sa ābhāsam sa viśadam adhigama mārgam

original: avātarata | ayaṃ ca vādo yathāsthānaṃ viśadīkarīṣyate |
analyzed: avātarata ayam ca vādaḥ yathāsthānam
nirākāra tva sa ākāra tva vaśāt api tad ālambanasya vastunaḥ
sattvam prakaṭitam bhavati
vijñātam ca bhavati jñānasya svarūpam
tad avabodha prakāraḥ ca
sarve api bāhya artha vādinaḥ

original: bauddhābauddhadārśanikā vaiśeṣika - vaibhāṣika - sautrāntika - gautamīyā jñānanirākāravādino bhavanti | teṣāṃ
analyzed: bauddha abauddha dārśanikāḥ vaiśeṣika vaibhāṣika sautrāntika gautamīyāḥ jñāna nirākāra vādinaḥ bhavanti teṣām

original: mate jñānānāṃ nirākāratvavaśādapi vastunaḥ sattvaṃ prakaṭitaṃ bhavati ,
analyzed: mate jñānānām nirākāra tva vaśāt api vastunaḥ sattvam prakaṭitam bhavati
viditaḥ ca bhavati jñānasya sva rūpa avabodha hetuḥ

original: | uktaṃ ca sarve'pi bāhyārtha - vastuvādino bauddhābauddhadārśanikā jñānanirākāratvavādinaḥ santi
analyzed: uktam ca sarve api bāhya artha vastu vādinaḥ bauddha abauddha dārśanikāḥ jñāna nirākāra tva vādinaḥ santi

original: | teṣāṃ mate yo'yaṃ jñāne ākāraḥ pratibhāsate ,
analyzed: teṣām mate yaḥ ayam jñāne ākāraḥ pratibhāsate
sa grāhaka jñānāt vyatiriktasya sthirasya kṣaṇikasya
vā grāhya bhūtasya arthasya eva
atas eva abauddha naiyāyikaiḥ pratyakṣa sthale nirākāra jñānāt
tad viprakṛṣṭam artham bodhayitum indriya arthayoḥ sannikarṣaḥ
vaibhāṣika sautrāntikaiḥ ca viṣaya indriya vijñānānām
trika sparśaḥ manyate
sakala sarva astivādi bauddhānām trika sparśa vādi tve samāne api
asti artha grahaṇa artha sārūpyābhyām trikāla eka kāla vādi tvābhyām

original: ca bhedaḥ | tato'rthājjātaṃ pratyakṣa miti vāsubāndhavapratyakṣa - lakṣaṇāt pūrvataḥ sata eva arthasya grahaṇaṃ jñāpyate ,
analyzed: ca bhedaḥ tatas ṛthāt jātam iti vāsu bāndhava pratyakṣa lakṣaṇāt pūrvatas sataḥ eva arthasya grahaṇam jñāpyate
kṣaṇa eka kāla mātra sthitasya paramāṇoḥ vijñānasya
sarūpaṇam iti sautrāntika pakṣaḥ uṅgīkriyate
ittham

original: bhede vastunaḥ sthiratva - kṣaṇikatve eva prayojake
analyzed: bhede vastunaḥ sthiratva kṣaṇikatve eva prayojake

original: | jñāne pratimāsamāna ākāra eva vastunaḥ arthakriyā ,

eṣaḥ eva ca vastunaḥ sattvam
etad adhigamena eva dhiyaḥ saṃvādi tvam
saṃvādi tvāt ca pramāṇyam svīkṛtam
evam ca pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ dvayoḥ api sākṣāt

original: paramparayā vā aviśeṣato vastvadhigamena avisaṃvādanāt prāmāṇyaṃ siddhyati |

original: yadyapi abauddhanaiyāyikairapi dhiyo nirākāratayā arthenaiva viśeṣo manyate ,

taiḥ jñāna artha indriyāṇām eka kālika tva kṣaṇa sattva pakṣaḥ
apahastitaḥ

original: ata eva teṣāṃ mate pūrvakālato vartamānayoḥ indriyārthayoḥ ,
analyzed: atas eva teṣām mate pūrva kālataḥ vartamānayoḥ indriya arthayoḥ
avayavi satoḥ

original: kāṇādagautamīyānāṃ nirākāravāditve'pi kṣaṇasattva - virodhād dravyaguṇakarmāṇi parāparātmakarūpeṇa

sāmānya viśeṣa ātmakāni jñāyante

original: tatra ca anekeṣāṃ pramāṇāṃ saṃplavo'pi na virūddhyate
analyzed: tatra ca anekeṣām saṃplavaḥ api na
bauddha mate tu viśeṣa mātram vastu
tad grāhakam ca kevalam pratyakṣam
tad bhinnam sarvam api prātitikam sāmānya mātram

original: tadgrāhakaṃ cānumānamiti pṛṣṭhabhāvi - vikalpa iti ca pakṣamaṃgīkṛtya asaṃkīrṇa pramāṇaṃ - prameyaṃ ca saṃsthāpya paraparikalpitapramāṇāni
analyzed: tad grāhakam ca anumānam iti pṛṣṭha bhāvi vikalpaḥ iti ca pakṣam aṃgīkṛtya asaṃkīrṇa pramāṇam prameyam ca saṃsthāpya para parikalpita pramāṇāni
dvayoḥ eva antar vilīyante
bauddhānām ca ayam pramā antarbhāva prakaraḥ

original: prayāśaḥ sakalairapi vedānugaiḥ nyāyadarśanakāraiḥ icchayā anicchayā vā avaśyasamarthanīyo
analyzed: sakalaiḥ api veda anugaiḥ nyāya darśana kāraiḥ icchayā anicchayā vā avaśya samarthanīyaḥ
jātaḥ anyāni ca pramāṇāni taiḥ

original: anumāne antarbhāvitāni evaṃ ca bauddhamatena upamānaśabdārthāpattyanupalabdhi - pramāṇajātaṃ jñānanirākāravāditvea samāne'pi
analyzed: anumāne antar bhāvitāni evam ca bauddha matena upamāna śabda artha āpatti anupalabdhi pramāṇa jātam samāne api

original: pramāṇānāṃ ca prāyaśaḥ svataḥ pramāṇyamiti vādāḥ
analyzed: pramāṇānām ca prāyaśas svatas pramāṇyam iti vādāḥ
sa prasaṅgam samudbhāvitāḥ
śāṅkara mate tu parama artha bhūtam brahyam pratyakṣa gocaram
tat hi nirvikalpakam nirākāram sva prakāśam

original: svataḥ pramāṇamiti bauddhapakṣamātmagatamiva kṛtvā svasañcchannaṃ saugatapramāṇanugatvaṃ
analyzed: svatas pramāṇam iti bauddha pakṣam ātma gatam iva kṛtvā sva sañcchannam saugata pramāṇa anuga tvam
vicchinnam karoti
kim bahunā dravya guṇa karmaṇām nyāya parikalpita lakṣaṇāni

original: avayavi - sāmānya - samavāya - saṃyogādīnāṃ svarūpato nirāsaḥ pūrvatanaiḥ

original: sautrāntikādibhiḥ kṛta eva brahyasūtra - tacchāṅkara - bhāṣyaṭīkādiṣu anukṛtaḥ bahudhā svaparibhāṣayā

kim adhikena

original: satyadvayaṃ trayaṃ vā ādhṛtya śaṃkarabhagavatpādaiḥ mithyāvādamūlo'dvaitavādo
analyzed: satya dvayam trayam vā ādhṛtya śaṃkara bhagavat pādaiḥ

original: na tirohitaṃ yad bauddhamate yathā svalakṣaṇamāśrityaiva
analyzed: na tirohitam yat bauddha mate yathā sva lakṣaṇam āśritya eva
mithyābhūtam sāmānya lakṣaṇam vastu tvena adhyavasīyate

mithyā bhūtam api bhāsate

original: brahyaṇo jñānarūpatvena ekatvena ca yo hi āpātiko
analyzed: brahyaṇaḥ jñāna rūpa tvena eka tvena ca yaḥ hi āpātikaḥ
bhedaḥ dṛśyate
saḥ upi vijñāna vāde asta

original: iva jāyate | ayaṃ hi vistarabhiyā tyajyate |
analyzed: iva jāyate ayam hi vistara bhiyā tyajyate
asti anyaḥ api avadheyaḥ bauddha pramāṇa mīmāṃsāyāḥ

original: prakarṣaḥ | prāyaśo bāhyavastusiddhihetoreva pramāṇavyavasthā sarvereva bauddhābauddhavastuvādibhiḥ
analyzed: prakarṣaḥ prāyaśas bāhya vastu siddhi hetoḥ eva pramāṇa vyavasthā sarveḥ eva bauddha abauddha vastu vādibhiḥ
vikāsam āpāditā
tena eva ca nāgārjuna āryadeva ādibhiḥ

vikampitaḥ vikhaṇḍitaḥ ca
tat anusṛtya ca śāṅkara advaitibhiḥ api

original: śrīharṣacitsukhaprabhṛtibhiḥ sasāṃkhyolūkyādi - vastuvādaḥ sāṭopaṃ niḥśeṣatāṃ nītaḥ | satyasmin
analyzed: śrī harṣa citsukha prabhṛtibhiḥ sa sāṃkhya ulūkī ādi vastuvādaḥ sa āṭopam niḥśeṣa tām nītaḥ sati asmin
mata pravāhe ati citram bauddha naiyāyikānām

koṭim āpāditam

sva sva prasthāna anurodhi pramāṇa śāstram naḥ ācaritam
ye tu arvācīnāḥ kecana
granthāḥ upalabhyante

original: te prāyaḥ gautama - bhaṭṭa - prabhākarādīnāṃ nayānukaraṇamūlā eva |
analyzed: te prāyas gautama bhaṭṭa prabhākara ādīnām naya anukaraṇa mūlāḥ eva
āsīt ādau prameya apekṣayā eva pramāṇa siddhi vyavasthā
tad anurodhena eva ca dharmakīrttinā api sva pramāṇavārtike

original: bāhulyena sautrāntikābhimato vastusadvādaḥ aṅgīkṛta ityasti saugatābhiyuktānāṃ
analyzed: bāhulyena sautrāntika abhimataḥ vastu sadvādaḥ aṅgīkṛtaḥ iti asti saugata abhiyuktānām
pāramparikam abhimatam
etad matasya sāra avabodhaḥ bhoṭa bhāṣā antarita aneka vyākhyā grantha ālocanaiḥ eva

original: nirṇeyaḥ | vastutastu bāhyasattvāsattvobhayavādasaha evāyaṃ pramāṇaparo grantha
analyzed: nirṇeyaḥ vastutas tu bāhya sattva asattva ubhaya vāda sahaḥ eva ayam pramāṇa paraḥ grantha

original: iti pramāṇavārttikānurodhena samupalabdhamanorathanandivṛtti - alaṅkārabhāṣyālocanena ca pratīyate |
analyzed: iti pramāṇa vārttika anurodhena samupalabdha manoratha nandi vṛtti alaṅkāra bhāṣya ālocanena ca pratīyate

original: jñāpyajñāpakabhāvaḥ tadabhāve ca anumānavyavahāro na svīkriyate ,
analyzed: jñāpya jñāpaka bhāvaḥ tad abhāve ca anumāna vyavahāraḥ na svīkriyate
kintu diṅnāga dharmakīrtti prabhṛtayaḥ pramāṇya vivecanāya
vijñāna vādam yathā a virūddham anukūlam ca jānanti
na tathā bāhya artha vādam
yadi api bāhya artha sat prameyam apekṣya eva jñāna prāmāṇya prasaṃge
arthakriyā kāri tvam
artha prāpaka tvam
artha adhyavasāyaḥ
pratyakṣe indriya ādi vijñānam
anumāne liṅga liṅginoḥ sambandhaḥ
dhūmāt agni bodhaḥ ca iti ādikam sampadyate iti āpātataḥ
pratīyate tathā api etat sakala upi
vyavahāraḥ yatas pratibhāsa mūla tvena eva loke prayujyate
śāstre ca api vicāryate

pratibhāsa balāt eva ca bāhya arthaḥ api adhigataḥ bhavati
atas bāhya itara vādayoḥ samāna rūpaḥ eva pramāṇa vicāraḥ
vijñāna vādibhiḥ prastūyate
niyata ākāra bodha hetu tve bāhya arthaḥ eva prayojakaḥ iti
bāhya arthibhiḥ svīkriyate

prabuddha vāsanā viśeṣaḥ vā
samanantara pratyayaḥ vā prabodhaka tvena niyāmakaḥ
syāt iti anena api na kācid vyavahāra bādhā
vijñāna vādi naiyāyikaiḥ yā bāhya artha hcintā
urarīkriyate
sā na bāhya artha vyapekṣayā
apitu dhiyaḥ vinimaya apekṣayā tattva avagāhinī bhavati
pratanyate iti kasyacid kiṃcid eva antar vāsanāyāḥ prayojakam

original: tato dhiyāṃ vinimayā na bāhyārthavyapekṣayā | | iti ca |
analyzed: tatas dhiyām vinimayāḥ na bāhya artha vyapekṣayā iti ca

original: ' upalambha eva vastusattā ' iti matamāmanadbhiḥ vijñānavādibhiḥ na arthena
analyzed: upalambhaḥ eva vastu sattā iti matam āmanadbhiḥ vijñāna vādibhiḥ na arthena
prayojanam aṅgīkriyate apitu pratibhāsena eva
pratibhāsaḥ hi bāhyam antareṇa eva
bhavati iti khyātam eva
evam sati dhūmāt agni anumāne dhūma pratibhāsā buddhiḥ

original: agnivāsanāpratibaddhā satī ekapratyayasāmagrībalād agnibhāsāṃ dhiyaṃ janayati |
analyzed: agni vāsanā pratibaddhā satī eka pratyaya sāmagrī balāt agni bhāsām dhiyam janayati

original: vastutastu ācāryadharmakīrtimate vāsanaiva arthakriyākāritvena paramārthaḥ | sa
analyzed: vastutas tu ācārya dharmakīrtimate vāsanā eva artha kriyā kāri tvena paramārthaḥ sa
ca pratibhāsa rūpaḥ
yaḥ hi jñānasya

original: viṣayaḥ | bāhyārthavāde'pi bahisthaḥ tātkāliko bahnirna anumīyate ,
analyzed: viṣayaḥ bāhya artha vāde api bahi sthaḥ tātkālikaḥ bahniḥ na anumīyate
ekasmin kāle kārya kāraṇa parijñāna abhāvāt apitu
bhāvi bhūtaḥ
bhāvi bhūtaḥ ca agniḥ pratibhāsa rūpaḥ eva
atas eva nahi apratibhāsena
agninā pramāṇa carcāyām kiṃcid prayojanam
evam vāsanā eva bhāvi pratibhāsā
eka tayā ca pratīyamānā pravartikā bhavat
uktam ca pramāṇavārtike

gameyat agni nirbhāsām dhiyam eva na pāvakam iti
yat tu sautrāntika vādam anusṛtya bāhya artha apekṣayā
tad anurodhena ca pramāṇa dvairūpyam iti diṅnāga dharmakīrtti prabhṛtibhiḥ
kṛtam tat saha upalambha niyama darśanāt samañjasam eva
bāhya artham anudhya
yaḥ hi ācāryeḥ vihitaḥ sa para apekṣayā eva
na vijñāna vāda apekṣayā
sva yūthya vidvas anurodhena
tu pramāṇa vyavasthāyām vijñāna vādaḥ eva śaraṇam iti
ubhayathā api pramāṇa prameya dvairūpya siddhāntaḥ
samañjasaḥ
uktam ca ācāryeṇa

original: astyeva viduṣāṃ vādo bāhyaṃ tvāśritya varṇyate|
analyzed: asti eva viduṣām vādaḥ bāhyam tu āśritya varṇyate
dvairūpyam saha saṃvitti niyamāt tat ca siddhi ati
